member.name: T:Jellyfin.Plugin.SsoOidc.Configuration.OidcProviderConfig
member.summary: Represents configuration for a single OIDC provider.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.SsoOidc.Configuration.OidcProviderConfig.ProviderName
member.summary: Gets or sets the display name of the OIDC provider.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.SsoOidc.Configuration.OidcProviderConfig.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this provider is enabled.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.SsoOidc.Configuration.OidcProviderConfig.OidEndpoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the OIDC discovery endpoint (metadata URL).

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.SsoOidc.Configuration.OidcProviderConfig.OidClientId
member.summary: Gets or sets the client ID used for authentication.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.SsoOidc.Configuration.OidcProviderConfig.OidSecret
member.summary: Gets or sets the client secret used for authentication.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.SsoOidc.Configuration.OidcProviderConfig.OidScope
member.summary: Gets or sets the requested OIDC scopes (e.g., "openid email").

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.SsoOidc.Configuration.OidcProviderConfig.UserLink
member.summary: Gets or sets the mapping from identity claim (e.g. email) to Jellyfin user IDs.

member.name: T:Jellyfin.Plugin.SsoOidc.Configuration.UserLinkEntry
member.summary: Represents a user mapping between an OIDC claim and a Jellyfin user ID.
